snippet: Researchers have developed a computer model that can judge someone’s personality more accurately than friends and family — using just the subject’s Facebook activity.
abstract: Youyou Wu study in journal Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences reports that researchers have developed algorithm that can predict person's personality more accurately than their friends and family by using their Facebook profile.
lead_paragraph: Researchers have developed a computer model that can judge someone’s personality more accurately than friends and family — using just the subject’s Facebook activity.

headline.print_headline: Psychology: Facebook Knows You Better Than Anyone Else
headline.main: Facebook Knows You Better Than Anyone Else

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
